- Thought: I need to add the "lang" attribute to the <html> element to improve accessibility by specifying the primary language of the document. The extracted text "All categories" does not provide a clear indication of the language used, but it's written in English. So, I will use "en" as the value for the "lang" attribute.

- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
